entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
